content.question: A plane is moving horizontally through the sky with speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. A package is dropped from the plane and travels a horizontal distance <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from the point of release to where it lands on a target. If air resistance is negligible, the height from which the package is released is

choices.label: <math alttext="one half g, times the square root of fraction x over v, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half g, t squared " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half g, times open parenthesis, the fraction x over 2 v, end fraction, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half g, times open parenthesis, the fraction x over v, close parenthesis, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one half g, times open parenthesis, the fraction v over x, close parenthesis, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half g, times open parenthesis, the fraction x over v, close parenthesis, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>
